alert.note: Alert for Codington; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:40PM MDT until August 10 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR GRANT AND NORTHEASTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 740 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Corona to near Milbank to Strandburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Milbank, Rauville, South Shore, Waverly, Revillo, Stockholm, Strandburg, Twin Brooks, La Bolt, Troy, Marvin, Albee, Dakota Sioux Casino and Lake Kampeska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
